title: Sehar
subtitle: ਅੱਜ ਆਖਾਂ ਵਾਰਸ ਸ਼ਾਹ ਨੂੰ · اَج آکھاں وارث شاہ نُوں
description: In the poem the poet invokes Waris Shah, a historic Punjabi poet, who wrote a popular version of Punjabi love tragedy Heer Ranjha. Pritam asks to record and witness the miserable condition of Punjab and its people after partition and open a new page of his book of love.
content: Mera sehar ek lambi behas ki tarah hai
Sadke betuki dalilo si
Aur galiyan iss tarah
Jaise ek baat ko koi idhar ghasita
Koi udhar
Har makan ek muthi sa bhicha hua
Diwarein kichkichati si
Aur naliyaan, jyon muhh se jhaag behata hai
Yeh behas jaane suraj se suru hui thi
Jo usse dekh kar yeh aur garmati
Aur har dwar ke muhh se
Phir cyclyion aur scooteron ke pahiye
galiyaan ke tarah nikalti
aur ghantyaan horn ek dusre par jhapate
Jo bhi bachha iss sehar mein janamta
Puchta, kis baat par ye bahas ho rahi ?
Phir uska prashan hi ek bahas banta
Bahas se nikalta, bahas mein milta
Sankh ghnato ek sans sukhate
Raat aati, phir tapakti aur chali jaati
Par nind mein bhi bahas khatam na hoti
Mera sehar ek lambi behas ke tarah hai...
- अमृता प्रीतम
